name: iPhone 12
display: 6.1 in; 1170x2532 px, Super Retina XDR OLED
cameraFeatures: Smart HDR 3 (makes photos a little sharper)
First cameras to support 4K 10-bit HDR with Dolby Vision
LiDAR sensor (for faster autofocus, better portrait mode photos in lowlight, and cool photo and video effects)
cameraPros: Night mode on all camera unlike predecessors
Apple is known for having very good dynamic range
cameraCons: Less digital capability than the 12 Pro Max
2.5x less optical zoom than the 12 Pro Max
Some people might feel it’s too saturated
cons: Fingerprint magnet
No 90 or 120 Hz screen refresh rate unlike other current flagships
Phone no longer comes with power adapter and EarPods ITB
Supposed to be shatter resistant due to Ceramic shield, but it's really not any more than before ~ MKBHD
approbations: "iPhones record the best quality video than any other smartphone and Apple has now taken it even further" ~ SuperSaf, Oct 2020

Night mode on front facing cameras
LiDAR sensor (for faster autofocus, better portrait mode photos in lowlight, and cool photo and video effects)

name: iPhone 11
display: 6.1 in; 828x1792 px, Liquid Retina HD LCD
cameraFeatures: Wider field of view in selfie mode than most phones
cameraPros: Improved camera in dynamic range, detail, volume, wider field of view in selfie, night shots
cameraCons: Does not have night mode on ultrawide or front camera
pros: Better battery than XR by 1 hr
iPhone 11s are most water resistant phones on the market in 2019
cons: No 3D touch
Don't have frosted back that other iPhone 11s have
Fast charging not included ITB unlike other iPhone 11s
Got rid of the dongle ITB (3.5mm to USB type-C) so now you have to pay an extra $10
approbations: Rated best display on a smartphone ~ DisplayMate (but is it?...)
